ComicInfo.Summary:
“Kingdom of Rats,” Part 2. Rat King's sinister influence spreads, and New York City's most vulnerable are at risk! The Turtles search out the Rat King's family in a desperate attempt to find a way to stop him!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Dave Wachter | 1 | B | Cover B | Kevin Eastman (a) & Tomi Varga (c) | 2 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover | Will Robson (a) & Brittany Peer (c) | 3 | RE | Comics & Ponies Exclusive Variant Cover | Kevin Eastman (a) & Tomi Varga (c) | 4 |
